mapper.select: SELECT m.username, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.enabled, m.profile_photo, m.course_id, a.role, c.course_name, c.end_date FROM member m JOIN authorities a ON m.username = a.username JOIN course c ON m.course_id=c.id WHERE a.role = #{role}

SELECT m.username, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.enabled, m.profile_photo, m.course_id, a.role, c.course_name, c.end_date FROM member m JOIN authorities a ON m.username = a.username JOIN course c ON m.course_id=c.id WHERE a.role = #{role} AND m.${intColumn} = #{intValue}

SELECT m.username, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.enabled, m.profile_photo, m.course_id, a.role, c.course_name, c.end_date FROM member m JOIN authorities a ON m.username = a.username JOIN course c ON m.course_id=c.id WHERE a.role = #{role} AND m.${stringColumn} LIKE '%${stringValue}%'

SELECT m.username, m.password, m.name, m.email, m.enabled, m.profile_photo, m.course_id, a.role, c.course_name, c.end_date FROM member m JOIN authorities a ON m.username = a.username JOIN course c ON m.course_id=c.id WHERE a.role = #{role} AND m.${stringColumn} LIKE '%${stringValue}%' AND m.${intColumn} = #{intValue}
SELECT count(*) count, s.subject subject_name FROM course c JOIN subject s ON c.subject = s.id GROUP BY c.subject ORDER BY count

SELECT count(*) AS count, c.course_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.subject AS subject_name FROM member m JOIN course c ON m.course_id = c.id WHERE m.enabled=0 GROUP BY c.course_name ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT count(*) AS count, a.username, m.name, m.course_id, c.course_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.subject FROM member m JOIN article a ON m.username = a.username JOIN course c ON m.course_id = c.id JOIN authorities au ON m.username = au.username WHERE au.role = "student" AND m.enabled != 0 GROUP BY a.username ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 1, 10

SELECT count(*) AS count, m.name FROM comment c JOIN member m ON c.username = m.username JOIN authorities au ON m.username = au.username WHERE au.role = "student" AND m.enabled != 0 GROUP BY c.username ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 1, 10

SELECT m.username, t.id AS teacher_id, m.name, m.email, m.enabled, m.profile_photo, m.course_id FROM member m JOIN authorities a ON m.username = a.username JOIN teacher t ON m.username = t.username WHERE a.role = "teacher"
SELECT id,subject FROM subject WHERE id != 0
